title: Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Two Drawers and Backsplash, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Serving Table with Two Drawers and Backsplash
medium: Graphite on thin cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left corner of image: TOP 3'-6" x 1'-10"; at upper left quadrant of image, with 2 arrows pointing to drawers: drawers; at lower right of design, with arrow pointing to right front foot: brass
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular body with 2 drawers at front and raised on 4 straight tapering legs; conforming lower shelf attached half way up legs from floor level; backsplash.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Two Drawers and Backsplash, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream tracing paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-72
